title: Riot Tiki LFG
body:
Hello friends! About to play some (potentially very bronzey) SR normals and wondering if anyone wants to join!

Find me here or in-game and I'll invite you!!!

If not I won't be offended, I'll just drink my [hot leaf juice](http://www.teefury.com/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/9df78eab33525d08d6e5fb8d27136e95/m/u/mug2015_b-mco-hot-leaf-juice_1.jpg) alone.
